channel.title: Iván Makes Games
channel.description: Recent content on Iván Makes Games

item.title: Godot
item.description: I’ve been doing quite a bit of general bugfixing in Godot lately. I’ve worked with the engine in one way or another for quite a few years now and contributing to open source projects is always very rewarding.

item.title: Octo
item.description: I wrote Octo to teach myself emulator programming. I’m not very sure it was very successful really, it’s and extremely simple system and very, very easy to emulate.

item.title: Welcome to my website
item.description: And just like this, I start a new website (yet) again. I’ll try to write a little bit about my personal projects, my experiences and anything that might come to mind. Yes, it’s pretty barebones at the moment, but you have to start somewhere right? I’ll make sure to keep adding content regularly. Enjoy your stay :)
